task.title: To Add an App Store to

step.cmd: Under App Store URLs, enter the name and content URL for your store definition YAML file, then click Add App Store URL.

taskbody.result: The app store is added to .
taskbody.postreq: To confirm that the App Store loads correctly, click App Store on the menu and view the list of applications. Of an app store URL fails to load, a "CC Catalog Manager" error is displayed in the Event Log if an app store URL fails to load.You can also view, add, enable, and disable app store URLs using the kato config command, for example:$ kato config get cloud_controller_ng app_store
